text: Hell in a Cell (2010) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on October 3, 2010 at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas. It was the second Hell in a Cell event held by WWE. ==Matches== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Hell in a Cell website Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2010 in professional wrestling Category:2010s in Texas Category:Sports in Dallas
title: Hell in a Cell (2010)
